sentences: Park Hyuk-kwon (born July 11, 1971) is a South Korean actor.
Park began his acting career in 1993 as a member of the theater troupe Sanulrim.

He later became a well-regarded supporting actor in films such as Chaw (2009) and Secret Reunion (2010), as well as the television series Behind the White Tower (2007), Secret Love Affair (2014) and The Producers (2015).
Park also frequently stars in short films and independent films, notably in Milky Way Liberation Front (2007) and other works by Yoon Seong-ho.
